participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and thoughtful, enjoys deep conversations about the universe and is passionate about learning.
participant_1.background: I have no children, but I do have a collection of little raincoat-wearing toys. I like to listen to rap music. I enjoy shopping and spending time with my dog, but I like to sleep in. I have aspergers. I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and creative, loves cooking and sharing recipes, enjoys spending quality time with family and pets.
participant_2.background: I like to eat the food that my grandmother taught me to cook. I have no siblings, but I'm hoping to learn some new tricks to teach my dog so we can have more adventures together! My husband and I live on the outskirts of the city so we can afford a large home, but we still have access to all the city amenities. I eat mainly chinese food. I've been told my steaks are to die for.

content.text: Hello, I am doing well! How about you?
I am doing good as well! I am just relaxing after a long day at work.
I am glad to hear that! I am about to start cooking dinner, what are you up to?
I am going to watch some TV, do you have any shows you like to watch?
I like to watch documentaries, what do you like to watch?
I like to watch astronomy documentaries, I find them really interesting.
Oh that sounds really cool! I've never watched one before, but I might have to check one out.
You should! They are really interesting, and you learn a lot about space.
I will definitely check one out!
Cool! What are you cooking for dinner?
I am going to make some of my grandma's recipes, I have a lot of them.
Oh that sounds really good! I love to cook, but I don't have a lot of recipes.
I can share some with you, if you want!
That would be great! I would love to try some of your grandma's recipes.
Awesome! I can send you some of them later
